pullRequest.body:
Those lemmas are specifically useful for rewriting backwards when the indexing type doesn't matter (and also sometimes useful forwardly).

From LeanAPAP


---

as the indexing type doesn't matter in practice. The appropriate forward direction lemma here is
`card_piFinset`. -/

and below

Let's put the Type argument and its instances before s and hs
